definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
hydrochloric acid HCl/also written 鹽酸|盐酸

sentences.english: The factors were studied which affected the preparation of PFS in this method.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯酸鈉氧化法制備PFS的影響因素。

sentences.english: Conclusions Protein aggregation is primary consequence of HSA after its exposure to HOCl.
sentences.chinese: 結論HSA經次氯酸處理後主要發生了蛋白聚集。

sentences.english: The plasma sample was directly injected for determination after being deproteinized with perchloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 血漿樣品用高氯酸沉澱蛋白後直接進樣。

sentences.english: Moisture will cause hydrochloric acid formation.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸汽將導致氫氯酸的生成。

sentences.english: The effective ingredient dissolving byssus is hypochlorite ion.
sentences.chinese: 導致足絲溶解的有效成分是次氯酸根。

sentences.english: At the same time, China's sodium chlorate production technology and equipment is also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 同時也介紹了中國的氯酸鈉生產工藝和設備。

sentences.english: Perchloride of iron used to etch gravure cylinders. Alernative term: etchant .
sentences.chinese: 中義腐蝕凹版輥筒的高氯酸鐵。

sentences.english: But it might also help in dealing with perchlorates.
sentences.chinese: 但它也可能有助於在處理高氯酸鹽。

sentences.english: Polyester fibers may also be bleached with hydrogen peroxide or sodium hypochlorite.
sentences.chinese: 滌綸纖維可用過氧化氫或次氯酸鈉漂白。

sentences.english: Rhodium in rhodium plating bath was determined by spectrophotometry with sodium hypochlorite as chromogenic agent.
sentences.chinese: 用次氯酸鈉作顯色劑光度測定鍍銠溶液中的銠。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the research process in aspects of NaClO used as root canal irrigati…
sentences.chinese: 本文就次氯酸鈉作爲根管沖洗液的研究進展作一綜述。

sentences.english: The effect of stabilized sodium chlorite on the preservation of strawberry was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了穩定性亞氯酸鈉溶液對草莓的保鮮效果。

sentences.english: The influence of NaClO purity to the oxidation reaction was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了次氯酸鈉純度對氧化反應的影響。

sentences.english: For ammonium perchlorate based propellants, it is usually the former.
sentences.chinese: 爲高氯酸銨爲基礎的推進劑，它通常是前者。

sentences.english: Chemical form of hafnium is perchlorate or nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 鉿的化學形態爲過氯酸鹽或硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: Features of sodium chlorite bleaching for cotton knits are described.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了亞氯酸鈉對純棉針織物漂白的特點。
